posts.post_title: FS 1910 E96 Philadelphia Caramel Mordecai Brown SGC 4
posts.post_content:
Gorgeous card.  $500 with PayPal FF.  First to say "I'll take it" gets it.  Thanks!

[url]https://dperrin14.wixsite.com/personal/page4?lightbox=dataItem-jw71vhga[/url]
Nice card.  You might consider moving it to the E card section to drum up more interest.  You're probably missing your audience in the the non-t206 tobacco section.
Thanks -- I'm new here, so I'm still catching on!
A picture would definitely help move things along for sure.
